EmailTemplate.description: All Services-standard response for counter signing customers contract
EmailTemplate.name: All Services-standard response for counter signing customers contract
EmailTemplate.subject: HONEYWELL CONTRACT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
Honeywell's position is our navigation and terrain database agreements are non-negotiable due to the commitments we have to other parties we are under license agreement with in order to provide the Navigational and Terrain database service.
Kind Regards,
Navigation and Terrain Database Team 602-436-6738 opt 1 through 5 dsa@honeywell.com HONEYWELL Aerospace
For 24-Hour/7-Day mechanical or avionics technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
DISCLAIMER This message is intended only for the use of the person(s) ("Intended Recipient") to whom it is addressed. It may contain information, which is privileged and confidential. Accordingly any forwarding, copying, dissemination or other use of this message or any of its content may constitute a breach of copyright and or breach of civil or criminal law and is strictly prohibited. Any views held by employees do not necessarily represent the views and opinions of the company.
VIRUSES Please note that we do not, to the extent permitted by the law, accept any liability (whether in contract, negligence or otherwise) for viruses and it is your responsibility to scan the attachments (if any).
